post:
Hey all,

I have an older server in my Winnipeg (central Canada) datacenter available for rent.  Looking glass is here: http://lg.freerangecloud.com

I can pre-install your choice of operating system or do it yourself - iLO access available upon request.

I only have one of these available, first come first served basis.

Server has the following specs:

**2x Intel Xeon E5310 CPUs (1.6GHz)**  
16GB RAM  
1x 1TB HDD  
1x 250GB HDD  
/30 IPv4 (1 usable address)  
/64 IPv6  
100mbps port unmetered  
Additional IPs are available -  $1/IP or a /29 for $5

order link: SOLD
